Package model

Class Review

java.lang.Object
model.Review
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Review
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class contains all information of a review - including the review's date, rating, review's content, reviewed Movie and name of reviewer
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Review

      public Review​(Movie movie, int rating, java.lang.String content, java.lang.String name)
      Allocates a Review object and initializes it. The object is specified by the Movie being reviewed, rating, review content and name of the reviewer.
      Parameters:
      movie - The reviewed movie
      rating - The rating reviewer gives
      content - The content of the review
      name - The name of reviewer
